meanings.definition: Spilings: plural noun meaning pieces of wood or other material used to support a structure
meanings.sent1: The carpenter placed the spilings carefully under the house to provide support.
meanings.sent2: The workers used spilings to reinforce the foundation of the building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the spilings as a makeshift obstacle course in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The spilings stood like loyal soldiers, holding up the old bridge.
meanings.sent5: The spilings resembled a row of tiny soldiers, standing guard around the construction site.

meanings.definition: Spilings: verb meaning to scatter or spread out in a disorderly way
meanings.sent1: The wind spilings the leaves across the yard, creating a messy scene.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to spilings the papers all over the desk.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy loves to spilings his toys around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spilings through the room, infecting everyone with joy.
meanings.sent5: The seeds spilings from the flower, finding new places to grow.
